title: It's a logic puzzle, not a dexterity game!
comment: I can only assume that all the one-star reviews for this app are from people who don't understand the point of it.  It's a great implementation of a certain type of logic puzzle, and it works exactly as it is supposed to.  Don't give it a bad review just because you're frustrated! Try to learn something new!
